description:
Hey Guys, 

welcome to our course about creative and tasty Ramen hacks. 

WE KNOW YOU WILL LOVE OUR DISHES! YOU SHOULD TRY THEM!

This course is FREE but we would ask you kindly for a little support: just send us a dollar or two so we can buy our next ramen :) paypal: ramenboys777@gmail.com

THANK YOU!

A lot of You think Ramen is just this boring but fast dish that is mainly eaten in college but don't judge to fast... With just a few simple tricks You can make amazing food with Ramen as the main ingredient. It is so simple and your friends and family will love it ! Pimp Your instant noodles ! Be part of our movement :)


We show you how to make 6!!! dishes all of them are really easy and the 6th dish is an amazing dessert ... YUM.

And the best part about it: for all the dishes You need just some basic ingredients like : cheese, butter or eggs, stuff you probably already have in your fridge.

It is a short course - 1 hour and we tried to make it as entertaining as possible, because You only learn new stuff if You enjoy the process.
title: Learn 6 creative instant Ramen HACKS for everyone
